defi_sdk_py.pool package

Module contents

class defi_sdk_py.pool.Pool[source]

Bases: object

Pool provides functionality to interact with the pool smart contracts.

activate_rank_event_block(pool: IAPHPool, from_block: int = 0, to_block: int = 0) → List[ActivateRankEvent][source]

Retrieves a list of activate rank event details within a block range.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • from_block – The starting block number

  • to_block – The ending block number

Returns:

A list of ActivateRankEvent objects containing the activate rank event details

activate_rank_event_tx(pool: IAPHPool, tx_hash: str) → ActivateRankEvent[source]

Retrieves the activate rank event details by transaction hash.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • tx_hash – The transaction hash to query for activate rank event

Returns:

An ActivateRankEvent object containing the activate rank event details

active_rank(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Activates the rank for a given NFT ID in the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID for which to activate the rank

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

borrow(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int, loan_id: int, borrow_amount: int, collateral_sent_amount: int, collateral_token: IERC20Metadata, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Initiates a borrowing transaction in the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the borrowing

  • loan_id – The loan ID for the borrowing

  • borrow_amount – The amount to borrow

  • collateral_sent_amount – The amount of collateral sent

  • collateral_token – The collateral token metadata

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

  • nft_id – The NFT ID for which to claim all interest

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Deposits an amount into the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the deposit

  • amount – The amount to deposit

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

Calculates the next borrowing interest for a specified borrow amount in the pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • borrow_amount – The borrow amount to query for interest

Returns:

The next borrowing interest as an integer

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query for lending details

Returns:

A Lend object containing the lending details

open_position(nft_id: int, is_long: bool, collateral_token: IERC20Metadata, underlying_token: IERC20Metadata, entry_price: int, size: int, leverage: int, slip_page: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0)[source]

Opens a new position in the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the position

  • is_long – A boolean indicating if the position is long (True) or short (False)

  • collateral_token – The collateral token metadata

  • underlying_token – The underlying token metadata

  • entry_price – The entry price for the position

  • size – The size of the position

  • leverage – The leverage for the position

  • slip_page – The slippage percentage

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas

token_address(pool: IAPHPool) → str[source]

Retrieves the token address of the specified pool.

Parameters:

pool – The pool contract interface

Returns:

The token address as a string

Retrieves the token holder details for a given NFT ID in the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID to query for token holder details

Returns:

A PoolTokens object containing the token holder details

withdraw(pool: IAPHPool, nft_id: int, amount: int, is_estimate=False, gas: int = 0, gas_price: int = 0, nonce: int = 0) → TransactionReceipt | int[source]

Withdraws an amount from the specified pool.

Parameters:

  • pool – The pool contract interface

  • nft_id – The NFT ID associated with the withdrawal

  • amount – The amount to withdraw

  • is_estimate – If True, returns the estimated gas for the transaction

  • gas – The gas limit for the transaction

  • gas_price – The gas price for the transaction

  • nonce – The nonce for the transaction

Returns:

The transaction receipt if not estimating gas, otherwise the estimated gas
